category-def.name: Stable CFEclipse
category-def.label: com.rohanclan.cfml.release.stable
category-def.description: This is the (in theory) stable release of CFEclipse. If you wish to test the latest, newest features then you can opt to use the CFEclipse Bleeding Edge version.

category-def.name: Bleeding Edge CFEclipse
category-def.label: com.rohanclan.cfml.release.bleedingedge
category-def.description: The bleeding edge of CFEclipse releases... Intended to save people from having to checkout their own copies from CVS. This is likely to have bugs in, is likely to break and could well knacker your projects. Use with care.
